an7.61:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava bhaggesu viharati susumaragire bhesakalavane migadaye.
an7.61:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma mahamoggallano magadhesu kallavalaputtagame pacalayamano nisinno hoti.
an7.61:1.4: Addasa kho bhagava dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena ayasmantam mahamoggallanam magadhesu kallavalaputtagame pacalayamanam nisinnam.
an7.61:1.6: seyyathapi nama balava puriso saminjitam va baham pasareyya, pasaritam va baham saminjeyya; evamevam—bhaggesu susumaragire bhesakalavane migadaye antarahito magadhesu kallavalaputtagame ayasmato mahamoggallanassa sammukhe paturahosi.
an7.61:1.8: Nisajja kho bhagava ayasmantam mahamoggallanam etadavoca:
an7.61:2.1: “Pacalayasi no tvam, moggallana, pacalayasi no tvam, moggallana”ti?
an7.61:2.3: “Tasmatiha, moggallana, yathasannissa te viharato tam middham okkamati, tam sannam ma manasakasi, tam sannam ma bahulamakasi.
an7.61:2.4: Thanam kho panetam, moggallana, vijjati yam te evam viharato tam middham pahiyetha.
an7.61:3.1: No ce te evam viharato tam middham pahiyetha, tato tvam, moggallana, yathasutam yathapariyattam dhammam cetasa anuvitakkeyyasi anuvicareyyasi, manasa anupekkheyyasi.
an7.61:3.2: Thanam kho panetam vijjati yam te evam viharato tam middham pahiyetha.
an7.61:4.1: No ce te evam viharato tam middham pahiyetha, tato tvam, moggallana, yathasutam yathapariyattam dhammam vittharena sajjhayam kareyyasi.
an7.61:4.2: Thanam kho panetam vijjati yam te evam viharato tam middham pahiyetha.
an7.61:5.1: No ce te evam viharato tam middham pahiyetha, tato tvam, moggallana, ubho kannasotani avincheyyasi, panina gattani anumajjeyyasi.
an7.61:5.2: Thanam kho panetam vijjati yam te evam viharato tam middham pahiyetha.
an7.61:6.1: No ce te evam viharato tam middham pahiyetha, tato tvam, moggallana, utthayasana udakena akkhini anumajjitva disa anuvilokeyyasi, nakkhattani tarakarupani ullokeyyasi.
an7.61:6.2: Thanam kho panetam vijjati yam te evam viharato tam middham pahiyetha.
an7.61:7.1: No ce te evam viharato tam middham pahiyetha, tato tvam, moggallana, alokasannam manasi kareyyasi, divasannam adhitthaheyyasi—
an7.61:7.2: yatha diva tatha rattim yatha rattim tatha diva.
an7.61:7.3: Iti vivatena cetasa apariyonaddhena sappabhasam cittam bhaveyyasi.
an7.61:7.4: Thanam kho panetam vijjati yam te evam viharato tam middham pahiyetha.
an7.61:8.1: No ce te evam viharato tam middham pahiyetha, tato tvam, moggallana, pacchapuresanni cankamam adhitthaheyyasi antogatehi indriyehi abahigatena manasena.
an7.61:8.2: Thanam kho panetam vijjati yam te evam viharato tam middham pahiyetha.
an7.61:9.1: No ce te evam viharato tam middham pahiyetha, tato tvam, moggallana, dakkhinena passena sihaseyyam kappeyyasi pade padam accadhaya sato sampajano utthanasannam manasi karitva.
an7.61:9.2: Patibuddhena ca te, moggallana, khippanneva paccutthatabbam:
an7.61:9.3: ‘na seyyasukham na passasukham na middhasukham anuyutto viharissami’ti.
an7.61:10.4: Sace, moggallana, bhikkhu uccasondam paggahetva kulani upasankamati, santi hi, moggallana, kulesu kiccakaraniyani.
an7.61:10.5: Yehi manussa agatam bhikkhum na manasi karonti, tatra bhikkhussa evam hoti:
an7.61:10.6: ‘kosu nama idani mam imasmim kule paribhindi, virattarupa danime mayi manussa’ti.
an7.61:10.7: Itissa alabhena mankubhavo, mankubhutassa uddhaccam, uddhatassa asamvaro, asamvutassa ara cittam samadhimha.
an7.61:11.4: Viggahikaya, moggallana, kathaya sati kathabahullam patikankham, kathabahulle sati uddhaccam, uddhatassa asamvaro, asamvutassa ara cittam samadhimha.
an7.61:11.6: Na panaham, moggallana, sabbeheva samsaggam na vannayami.
an7.61:11.7: Sagahatthapabbajitehi kho aham, moggallana, samsaggam na vannayami.
an7.61:11.8: Yani ca kho tani senasanani appasaddani appanigghosani vijanavatani manussarahasseyyakani patisallanasaruppani tatharupehi senasanehi samsaggam vannayami”ti.
an7.61:12.1: Evam vutte, ayasma mahamoggallano bhagavantam etadavoca:
an7.61:12.2: “kittavata nu kho, bhante, bhikkhu sankhittena tanhasankhayavimutto hoti accantanittho accantayogakkhemi accantabrahmacari accantapariyosano settho devamanussanan”ti?
an7.61:13.5: So sabbam dhammam abhijanati, sabbam dhammam abhinnaya sabbam dhammam parijanati. Sabbam dhammam parinnaya yam kinci vedanam vediyati sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va.
an7.61:13.6: So tasu vedanasu aniccanupassi viharati, viraganupassi viharati, nirodhanupassi viharati, patinissagganupassi viharati.
an7.61:13.7: So tasu vedanasu aniccanupassi viharanto viraganupassi viharanto nirodhanupassi viharanto patinissagganupassi viharanto na kinci loke upadiyati,
an7.61:13.8: anupadiyam na paritassati, aparitassam paccattamyeva parinibbayati.
an7.61:13.9: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati.
an7.61:13.10: Ettavata kho, moggallana, bhikkhu sankhittena tanhasankhayavimutto hoti accantanittho accantayogakkhemi accantabrahmacari accantapariyosano settho devamanussanan”ti.
